name: Gravity Trajectory
description:
A 2D Top-Down Game and made in only 2 days! In it you have to defend your home planet against several objects, ranging from satelites to other planets. As the pilot of the ship, you have the ability to push those objects away from you, or to pull them closer to you

Controls: Keyboard & Mouse

Language: English

Team:

  • Collin K. - Programmer
  • Emily - Art
  • Leo L. - Game Design & Art
  • Maria K. - Art
